item.title: Toy Go
item.description: toy-go Some useful tools for gopher Json to Go DDL to Go To be continue … setup Run in Docker docker run -p 9090:9090 destory/toy-go:v0.0.1 Visit http://localhost:9090 usage Json to Go A tool that can quickly convert json to go code.
